## DefaultResolver variable

A set of default resolvers useful in configuring a container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
DefaultResolver: Readonly<{
    none(key: Key): Resolver;
    singleton(key: Key): Resolver;
    transient(key: Key): Resolver;
}>
```
